```{r}
pkData <- data.frame(time=1:5,
                     Cp=c(75, 55, 41, 30, 22))

pkModel <- lm(log(Cp)~time, data=pkData)
(kel <- -coef(pkModel)[2])
(Cp0 <- exp(coef(pkModel)[1]))
(tHalf <- log(2)/kel)
```
